metadata.title: CVE-2024-4835 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A XSS condition exists within GitLab in versions 15.11 before 16.10.6,16.11 before 16.11.3, and 17.0 before 17.0.1. By leveraging this condition,an attacker can craft a malicious page to exfiltrate sensitive userinformation.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
